title: Lovelace
description: The smallest unit of Ada. 1 Lovelace = 1/1,000,000 Ada. A lovelace is to Ada what a Satoshi is to Bitcoin.

props.body: The smallest unit of Ada. 1 Lovelace = 1/1,000,000 Ada. A lovelace is to Ada what a Satoshi is to Bitcoin.
